text: WIÞ DEOFLE AND UNGEMYNDE: Wiþ deofle liþe drenc and ungemynde, do on ealu cassuc, elehtran moran, finul, ontre, betonic, hindheoloþe, merce, rude, wermod, nefte, elene, ælfþone, wulfes comb.
Gesing XII mæssan ofer þam drence and drince.
Drenc wiþ deofles costunga: þefan þorn, cropleac, elehtre, ontre, bisceopwyrt, finul, cassuc, betonice, gehalga þas wyrta, do on ealu haligwæter.
And sie se drenc þær inne, þær se seoca man inne sie, and simle ær þon þe he drince, sing þriwa ofer þam drence:Deus in nomine tuo salvum me fac.
